item.title: Stratus: Battle for the sky early access steam
item.author: invalid@example.com (barnEbiss)
item.dc:creator: barnEbiss
item.content:encoded:
After much tweaking to get the lobby pretty much stable for logging on and joining MP games Stratus has gone on Early access on steam...

http://store.steampowered.com/app/355490

Build is still basic and has issues but we have been rolling out patches in the past few week that started to add more functionality to the gui such as hot keys for bridges and buildings and new health bars for units and buildings. we still are resolving a resource collector pathing issue and aiming to...

Stratus: Battle for the sky early access steam

item.title: New DooM game
item.author: invalid@example.com (NeoNite)
item.dc:creator: NeoNite
item.content:encoded:
Here's a long trailer of the new Doom game, shown at E3. Looks like it could be fun.



Couple of quick observations:
- chainsaw seems a bit too powerfull?
- There's no need for a slowdown when you switch to another weapon
- As a nice nostalgic wink; include an optional statusbar (or just the face) someone could probably, if possible, mod that in.
But it's still early; Realse if I'm not mistaken would be for spring next year.

item.title: Grand Theft Auto 5 - Again
item.author: invalid@example.com (Jacks:Revenge)
item.dc:creator: Jacks:Revenge
item.content:encoded:
are you mother fathers ready for next Tuesday or what?
holy shit balls on a tit boar, Batman! have y'all been following this news?

the features they're adding to the next-gen release of GTAV are staggering.
and of course it's finally arriving at home on PC so it'll be completely open to the modding community on top of that. but it's a goddamn laundry list of improvements, the least of which is the introduction of a 100% robust First-person system to cover all aspects of gameplay....

Grand Theft Auto 5 - Again

item.title: Looking for Playtesters! [Jeklynn Heights]
item.author: invalid@example.com (Vaskadar)
item.dc:creator: Vaskadar
item.content:encoded:
So, I'm an effects artist on this game called Jeklynn Heights and we're looking for some pre-launch playtesters to participate in server testing as well as general playtesting. I've got 9 steam keys to go and hope to get people that can regularly participate.

http://www.jeklynnheights.com/

Feel free to message me on here or on Steam!

item.content:encoded: OK, this is dated a bit but my old install is screwed up so I thought I'd try installing it on my Win8.1 two-year old Asus ROG laptop. Anyone know if this will be a problem? I believe there are at least 3 updates after original install (this is the original Doom 3 that is). Thank you.

Open beta ends on sunday. From what I saw it's 2 MP maps and very reminiscent of Quake3 Arena.

item.title: Bloodstained: Ritual of the Night [UE4 - E3 Demo available]
item.author: invalid@example.com (Delacroix)
item.dc:creator: Delacroix
item.content:encoded:
...if you know where to look.

So essentially, I played through this. Just one level for now and playtime is 10-20 minutes. Short pleasure, a mere 700+ MB download... but boy, the nostalgia.

Igarashi and his merry band of geniuses are definitely onto something here. Basically, if you love the classic (non-Lords-of-Shadow) Castlevania series, you MUST get this game, no questions asked. It's precisely what you're looking for.

The demo has the protagonist Miriam traverse a pretty worn-down...

Bloodstained: Ritual of the Night [UE4 - E3 Demo available]

item.title: Jeklynn Heights is Coming to Steam!
item.author: invalid@example.com (Vaskadar)
item.dc:creator: Vaskadar
item.content:encoded:
I'm proud to present to you all, Jeklynn Heights, a multiplayer game that takes place in a twisted fairytale world, where during the day, the folks are kind, but at night, they become a murderous mob!

I made the effects for the characters, explosions, and spells, to convey gameplay elements to the players.

Jeklynn Heights Steam Page

item.title: What are you playing?
item.author: invalid@example.com (TWD)
item.dc:creator: TWD
item.content:encoded:
I've always enjoyed playing with everyone on this forum, but it seems lately I've just been out of sync with everyone. Perhaps we can all find some middle ground or something. Post the multiplayer games you are currently playing.

Planetside 2: I have 100 hours logged on this game now. In my opinion, it is the greatest team based shooter since UT2004.

MechWarrior Online: Amazing game. Highly strategic, extremely team oriented. Getting together with friends over teamspeak is an...

What are you playing?

item.title: I'm sorry
item.author: invalid@example.com (Leo(T.C.K.))
item.dc:creator: Leo(T.C.K.)
item.content:encoded:
I'm sorry guys but I've just looked into the Mobile Forces game deeper. The game build and everything about it is with no doubt THE Unreal Warfare engine, the original one where UW started on and Unreal 2 followed and this explains also the missing link in MP developement when it's clear that Retro had the UW license from this point.

It took ages for Mobile Forces to come out but its engine is really the missing link between unreal engine "1" and "2"...
Sure it's a bit of a crude game but...

I'm sorry
